name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William Phillips AFRICA, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William Phillips AFRICA, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Bruce A. Franzel, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Mark Gurevitz, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
439 A.2d 620
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William Phillips AFRICA, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Filed Jan. 29, 1982.
Bruce A. Franzel, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Mark Gurevitz, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
